room_title: Escape room "Jumanji VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: We did the Star Wars, Jumanji, and Avengers VR and they were all awesome in their own ways. Highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Jumanji VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: My friends and I totally enjoyed Jumanji and The Avengers! The whole VR experience was really thrilling for us. It was trippy, but it was really cool! The staff is also very warm and friendly. They were also patient with all our questions. Special shoutout to our guide, Sidney! She was very accommodating, and she's good at her job. Would definitely want to come back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Jumanji VR" by The Void Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: We were the first group to play the new Jumanji adventure today, being so new it had some quirks but overall it had us laughing hard and made us tempt our bravery in the Jumanji world. The interactivity level raises the bar from Stars Wars and even Avengers...which are both great already. Staff friendly, and we were put in the experience right on time.
